channel.title: MMORPG to RPG
channel.description:
What kind of work would be needed to take a multiplayer view game and change it to a first person view game, such as making zones accessable by only certain level players, how to drop shops into diffrent areas, possibly even throwing a few quests in there that change character rights so that they "unlock" new abilities, and even create a few new spells.
If possible I would like to know how to reskin items too, or make items to skin.
Guides would be helpful if you have them.
(I hope I didn't put my first post in the wrong spot)

item.title: MMORPG to RPG

If possible I would like to know how to reskin items too, or make items to skin.

Guides would be helpful if you have them.

(I hope I didn’t put my first post in the wrong spot)[/quote]

1 part covered ty. Now then, can anyone else help me out here?
